name: NeverHaveIEver
0:
”Alexa open never have I ever”
”Alexa start never have i ever”
”Alexa play never have i ever”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: never have i ever
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Never Have I Ever contains more than 1.000 statements in different packs 

How to play Never Have I Ever as a Drinking Game

Open the skill - say: "Alexa, open Never Have I Ever"
Start the game - say: "next statement"
Alexa will read a Never Have I Ever statement to you. 
Everybody who did what was stated has to drink. 
Continue with the next statement by saying "next statement"

Different Available Packs

- Party - Amazing Never Have I Ever statements to get the party going
- Popular - Popular Never Have I Ever statements ranging through different topics
- Relationships - Relationship related Never Have I Ever statements suited for couples
- School - School related Never Have I Ever statements 

Playing different packs 

- To play a specific pack say "Next party statement" or "Next statement from the party pack" 
 
To listen to the rules say "Help" or "Rules"
At anytime, you can stop playing the drinking game Never Have I Ever by saying "Alexa, stop" or "quit playing" 

Hardware requirements: Any device capable of running Alexa can play Never Have I Ever
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
